## ABOUT US

Peterson Management Group is a family-owned and operated restaurant management
company with 12 restaurants located across North Texas. Founded by Bob
Peterson and Scott Holyfield, two guys with larger-than-life personalities, it
all started in 1983 with eclectic seafood shack restaurants, Aw Shucks and Big
Shucks Oyster Bar. They are the best places in North Texas to get raw oysters,
shrimp, catfish, crab legs, po’boy boy sandwiches, a nice cold beer, and some
tasty crawfish when in season.

In addition to Aw Shucks and Big Shucks, Peterson Management Group opened Blue
Goose Cantina in 1984, where fantastic made-from-scratch Mexican food,
legendary cocktails, top-notch service, a fun atmosphere and a kick-ass
attitude come together. The restaurant chain has repeatedly been voted the
best in North Texas for its winning combination of food, fun, and signature
margaritas. Today, Nick Peterson, son of Bob, leads the family business,
serving as its CEO.

## EST.1983

Since 1983, Aw Shucks and Big Shucks Oyster Bars have been the best places in
North Texas to get raw oysters, shrimp, catfish, crab legs, po’boy boy
sandwiches, a nice cold beer, and some tasty crawfish when in season. With its
eclectic seafood shack atmosphere, guests are guaranteed to have the best
shuckin’ time. A division of Peterson Management Group, a family-owned and
operated restaurant management company, there are five locations in North
Texas. For more information on Aw Shucks and Big Shucks, visit
awshucksdallas.com. Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for the latest news
and promotions. #shucksdallas

Visit the Website

## SINCE 1984

Established in 1984, Blue Goose Cantina brings together fantastic made-from-
scratch Mexican food, legendary cocktails, top-notch service, a fun
atmosphere, and a kick-ass attitude. A division of Peterson Management Group,
a family-owned and operated restaurant management company, Blue Goose
currently has seven North Texas locations with an additional location opening
in early 2023. For more information, including menu and locations, visit
BlueGooseCantina.com. Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for the latest news
and promotions. #bluegoosecantina

Visit the Website
